reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautiful Home in a magnificent setting,you can see why they have many wedding receptions. Lovely grounds with young winery and orchards. Rooms are excellent and very reasonable priced.good breakfast. Had a lovely evening meal on our first night with Marianne ( Robin unfortunately had business elsewhere ) Deliciously cooked Lamb, Yummie, an excellent meal including wine very reasonable priced. Masterton is quite big compared to many towns in the area.
reviews.title: First Class accommodation and Lovely Location
